name: Activitylighter
tagline: ActivityLight is a Luxafor status program that reads your availability from your Lync client or Exchange account and sets the color of the Luxafor light thereby.
body:
### Activitylighter
ActivityLight is a Luxafor status program that reads your availability from your Lync client or Exchange account and sets the color of the Luxafor light thereby. You can also choose your own availability and ActivityLighter will update your Lync status.

![Activitylighter](https://i.imgsafe.org/b42ab2c724.png)
![Settings](https://i.imgsafe.org/b42ac1c12a.png)
![Tray icon w/context menu.](https://i.imgsafe.org/b42ae9d92d.png)

### Availability USB light devices
If you have any other USB availability devices other than Luxafor(r) that could be integrated, please let me know.


### Support or Contact
If you have any questions please contact me at borge.jakobsen@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
